====Usage notes====
* This character is indigenous to Japan. It is not used in Chinese.
* This character is not used alone. It must pair up with {{ja-l|飩}} to form {{ja-l|饂飩}}.
** However, {{lang|ja|饂飩}} is usually written in kana as {{ja-l|うどん}}.
